body_html:
@jhseu I think this is caused by our nightly and release GPU builds having to move to ubuntu 16, because the there are no more ubuntu 14 docker images with cuda9.

Maybe our builds are missing this flag: --cxxopt="-D_GLIBCXX_USE_CXX11_ABI=0"
body_text:
@jhseu I think this is caused by our nightly and release GPU builds having to move to ubuntu 16, because the there are no more ubuntu 14 docker images with cuda9.
Maybe our builds are missing this flag: --cxxopt="-D_GLIBCXX_USE_CXX11_ABI=0"
body:
@jhseu I think this is caused by our nightly and release GPU builds having to move to ubuntu 16, because the there are no more ubuntu 14 docker images with cuda9.

Maybe our builds are missing this flag: `--cxxopt="-D_GLIBCXX_USE_CXX11_ABI=0"`
